title: DP Best Of
itunes:title: DP Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the Masters with Sir Nick Faldo. What did he see from Tiger, and what's special about Scottie Scheffler. Mike Tirico calls in to discuss calling The Masters on radio for Sirius XM. And Reggie Miller shares his opinion on Frank Vogel getting the blame for the Lakers failures this season.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
